translations: v.从……获得；找出……的来源（source 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Together they travel the world, sourcing clothes for the small, privately owned company.
sentences.translation: 他们一起环游世界，为那家小私营公司寻找服装货源。

sentences.sentence: They said the saving in expense made it worthwhile even though sourcing it took quite a bit of time.
sentences.translation: 他们说，节省这笔开支是值得的，尽管采购它花了不少时间。

sentences.sentence: With production anticipated to increase by 25% between now and 2030, sustainable energy sourcing will become an increasingly major issue.
sentences.translation: 从现在到2030年这段时间，石油产量预计将增加25%，而可持续能源的来源将成为一个日益重要的话题。
